title: @Riot I'm done
body:
I Got permaban for third party programs....WUT ik surprising whats even more suprising is that only software i use when i play league is VO changers              ( LVOC ) that has only 1 function and 1 function only. VO change. sent in a ticket asking them if they wanted the program i used and that i haven't done crap to hack the game get advantage whatsoever and it's not like they have proof to say otherwise anyways. and i get  back with this 

Your account has been permanently suspended following the use of scripts, hacks, exploits or unauthorized third-party programs in League of Legends. Accounts that are caught using hacks to gain an unfair competitive advantage are subject to permanent suspension. We work hard to preserve a fair and competitive environment in League of Legends. Regardless of intent, use of unauthorized third-party programs is explicitly against the Terms of Use, which can be found here:

OCE: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/legal/termsofuse

Keep in mind that account sharing of any kind is also against the Terms of Use. You are responsible for all activity on your account, so be sure to keep your account information to yourself.

We won't be able to go into the specifics of an account's exploit abuse, as divulging this information could compromise future investigations. Let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.

Freya The Fae 
Player Support Specialist 
Intern for the Revered Inventor

Cause its not like i've been reading through the Ts and Cs lately to see what the hell i've done wrong and this "supports" just sit on their ass all day get paid and doesn't even care about helping and even more insulting they gave me a fucking intern to talk to. When i mean talk i mean "copy and paste something related". They may be a million dollar companying but that doesn't give them the right to slack off. What happened to "If the customers are helping then we are happy we could help" BS. Without any proof or evidence but a faulty detecting system is not the way to go. i would think with the money u have u would invest in that. Im Done. I have barely played for year starting on the 15 July 2015 and am almost in Silver 5 just getting into Bronze 1 this week. I don't even a chance at URF anymore. Your game is fun, the community is fine. It's you that is the problem. Your unbalanced game makes people rage, Your stupid report system makes players laugh at you and ur unjustified ban system with no proof of anyone doing anything makes people sick of you. Was this what u had in mind? There are trolls out there, actual hackers still on the loose, people still rage quitting and u chose to focus on a guy who has done nothing against the code of conduct in any way shape or form that just show how you prioritise . Rioters my not read this, but i've said what i have to say. I'm done with league of legends. Some of u guys are thinking "wrote this post cause mad that he got banned" Not mad cause i was banned, mad cause the ban was unjustified. Doesn't rly matter i'm done i quite

replies.body: Why tf do u need to change VO? Pointless lmao
Yea i admit it is pointless.. let me ask u back a question with "VO" Why tf would they ban me for changing my VO? Pointless lmao
3rd-party programs aren't allowed, doesn't matter what it does. You can try reading sometimes

Yes they are and yes it does...and i have been reading 

Officially stated from Rioter Draggles (EUW)  Quote " As an update to this, we're not banning for any VO replacements, but as with every other modification to League of Legends, anything you change is at your own risk."

and 

"Some third party programs do a large number of things and let the player choose which they want. However, if a program allows for the ability to do one of the "Not fine" things above in game, then we'll ban for the use of it, even if a player claims they are not using that option. 

As stated VOs are allowed and has ben officially confirmed by a rioter and furthermore. ^ that statement refesr to such programs as MKLOL that gives jg timers that is against Riots law and just so happens that LVOC doesn't not have 

Fine:
- Any software that does not interfere directly with the in-game player experience between when you press “Play” and the end of game screen. VO mods are fine, they're localised to you and they don't give an advantage to your team.

Not fine:
- Exposing information that’s intentionally obfuscated (cooldowns or timers)
- Taking actions on your behalf (botting or scripting)
- Drawing conclusions for you (predicting enemy positions)
- Otherwise altering your field of intelligence (zoomhacks or global ult alerts)

Straight out of the Ts and Cs

Proves my point
I had a similar thing happen, they dont just straight up ban you, they send an email warning you to remove it beforehand

NOPE they didn't send me any email warning me about anything whatsoever i wish they did that would have ben fucking sweat but nope. woke up one morning and boom permasuspension. Thats like walking up to someone and they just punched u the hardest they can and their excuse was "I heard u been talking shit about me" when u know that its BS and u dont' deserve it but you know what...fuck u bcause no one cares for u. not the person who punched you not the concealing u got for when u got bullied bcause god knows that was just a waste of time
TL;DR Got banned for changing in game league voices
And that isn't suppose to happen but it did anyways which is so fucking stupid
